actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from gross income the interest on deposits in banks and certain other savings institutions.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income the first $800 ($1,600 for persons filing joint returns) earned as interest on savings deposits in financial institutions.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from gross income the interest on deposits in banks and certain other savings institutions.
